Blog

Movie Discovery

Development of the prototype of an iOS app. "Movie Discovery" is an iOS application that allow users to find good movies and series to watch, filtering by different criterias.

About me

My name is Danielle Vicosa and live and work in Berlin, Germany. I design mobile and web applications and my is passion to transform challenging requirements into human and intuitive experiences. I believe that a good design can impact other peoples lives in a positive and useful way.
